1.content: Hello! This is the story about... Well... What can we call our protagonist without it being confusing in the case someone else shares his name? I know, we'll call him "Z". Just Z. Now then, I don't know how old he is exactly, but he's a young teen. Z has a unique ability to grow other people. Not just any people, his favorite guys from, well, anything! He can grow then by skin contact. Although, how much they grow is up to Z. He love to start off slowly which sometimes messes with them. He can also change reality to accommodate the change. Now then, you may be asking: "Who is the guy that he's going to grow?" That is up to you! Know what character Z likes? Then follow him on his growing journey.

Z found himself strolling along the streets of SanFransokyo. He LOVED Hiro and Tadashi from Big Hero 6. Thankfully, he's in a version of it where Tadashi didn't die in the fire. Walking into The Lucky Cat with a suitcase, he approached Aunt Cass.
"Excuse me miss"
"What can I help you with?" Cass asked.
"I'm part of an abroad program and my home stay was at this address, here's the paper." Z had it all figured out, a "non-refundebul one-way trip" he explained.
"Oh, um..." Aunt Cass was confused. She hadn't heard anything about this. She wasn't sure if his program was real. If not, the boy would be without a home for awhile.
"Is something wrong?" Z asked.
"Oh, right! I forgot you were coming!" Cass couldn't leave him on his own. "Come up, we'll get you settled" and with that, Z was now staying with the Hamada family. Aunt Cass explained she "accepted" to be part of the program to Hiro and Tadashi before they went to their room. They didn't know she didn't actually accept anything.

His friends were between half a foot and 2.5 feet taller and many pounds heavier, and that was clearly intimidating him. 1253322221221.content:
Z loved to help the twins. Like Haruhi, he is able to tell them apart. He just loves watching all the girls' reactions to their usual antics.
"So you guys need help?"
"Yeah, we've overbooked so as surprising as it may be we need a third person." Hikaru explained.
"You don't mind, do you Z?" Asked Kaoru.
"Not at all! I love your antics!" Something then sparked in Hikaru.
"So, what do you think we should do then?" Z had a confused expression on his face. "About our antics. We've been doing the same things for months. I think we need something new."
"I agree. As creative as we are, we don't always get a good idea for them." Kaoru added.
"Why don't you argue who's bigger?" Now it was the twins who had blank expressions. "Your twins. You look alike. Maybe work out more and use that?" The twins contemplated over it. They had been only working out for a few hours.

"An hour." Said Kaoru. Z then helped them up. After washing off the sweat, they noticed their clothes slightly tugged on their bodies. Brushing it off, the continued to the host club. The next day, Z had to convince them to return again.

"They asked me since they didn't want to get involved if you two were your antics."

Has Z been accepted to My Hero Academia?
Z was able to get into the Hero course through a favor. His quirk is, well... let's call it "Enhancer," It can grow a person's size and shrink them back to normal. Works for height and muscle. One problem: it only works on guys. Also, the effects were permanent until Z undid it. Z demonstrated his quirk on the principle as he was part of the favor and grew him a foot and returned to normal height. Although it didn't work on females, Z was accepted into the Hero course after the staff saw the usefulness of the quirk. It had been a few months and he made friends with just about everyone in the class. A few guys wanted to grow and have asked several times, but Z was reluctant to use his quirk (at first *wink*). One day, Z decided to start using it more often...
1253322222.title: My Hero Academia

choices: While Z and Deku had lunch
125332222211.content:
It was another normal day at school. Meaning that some of the guys were asking Z to grow them. It mainly annoyed him why Aoyama and Mineta wanted to grow while it humorous to why Kaminari and Kirishima wanted to grow. The first two for selfish reasons while the other two just thought it would be cool.
"You guys, I'm not really in the mood right now" Z answered. "Maybe after lun.." Z was cut off.
"If your growing anyone, it's me!" It was Bakugo, spouting nonsense. Z stood up.
"I've had it with you. In contrast to these guys, you've been demanding I grow you without any concern for what I feel. Why would the first person I grow be you? If fact, why would I use my quirk to help you when you see me as nothing as a stepping stone?" Z had swung his arm into Deku by accident, causing Deku to receive a small burst of Z's quirk before falling over. "Oops, sorry Deku."
"Midoria are you okay" asked Kirishima. Deku stood up holding his his shoulder.
"Yeah, it was more surprising if anything. Everyone saw that Deku had grown from Z's quirk. Originally at 166cm, he was now as tall as Shoji at 187cm.
"That is so cool!" Yelled Kaminari.
"Sorry Deku. I can shrink you back after lunch." Deku just smiled and laughed nervously and followed Z to lunch. This didn't sit well with Bakugo. Being at 172cm, Bakugo was 12cm taller than Deku. Now Deku was 15cm taller than him. A bigger difference in height than normal.
125332222211.title: Sorry Deku

choices: Z called Deku, Kirishima, and Kaminari to beef them up
Z called Todoroki, Ojiro, and Sero to grow then to 6'2(187cm)
1253322222111.content:
"Again, sorry about that. I'm not used to using my quirk on an empty stomach."
"That's alright." Deku replied.
"How's it feel being 6'2?"
"It's, different. But in a positive way." The two continued to eat their lunch when Kaminari and Kirishima showed up with sparkles in their eyes.
"Fine. Hold still." Z stood up and placed an arm on their shoulders and grew them to 187cm, same as Deku now.
"Man this is so cool!" Yelled Kirishima.
"I know right?" Said Kaminari. The two join Z and Deku for the remainder for lunch. Uraraka Then showed up to remind us that we had to go out to the field to practice our quirks. When we were about to leave, Uraraka tugged my arm.
"Deku seems so tall now."
"Well I did grow him to 6'2." She knew that, but she found it strange that she only came up to Deku's shoulders. Out on the field, Deku, Kirishima, and Kaminari were surprised to find their superhero costumes fit. Z must have grew them. Come to think of it, their school uniforms had grown with them, so it shouldn't have been that strange. Both Aoyama and Mineta were upset that Z still didn't want to grow them, Bakugo was especially. Jiro was weirded out with Kaminari's new height getting a similar feeling that Uraraka had with Deku. After about half an hour, Deku asked why Z wasn't practicing.
"Did you forget what my quirk was." Z smirked.
"Oh, right." Deku sheepishly smiled while scratching the back of his head.
"Oh, I know!"
1253322222111.title: Lunch and Practice

Z removed the covers and placed his hand on his head and watched him grow. 5'8, then 5'10, 6', and finally 6'2. Z then got the clothes Joe was going wear at the party. These won't fit him now he thought. Z then grew his clothes to match Joe's new height and planted them back. Z then left and went to bed.
"Wake up, we'll be late." Z woke to Casper. Z got dressed and went to see Joe. He saw Joe was dressed as well. And his shoes on too.
"Notice anything different?" Joe winked as he asked. Z laughed, not because of the prank, but because Joe didn't notice he actually had grown. It would seem that Casper hadn't noticed anything yet, which was understandable since they had just woken up. They then got into the car to go to the party.
What happens?
